snippet.title: Outer Terror - Official Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Outer Terror is a casual bullet hell survival horror game with rogue-lite elements. Battle an onslaught of deadly otherworldly monsters while exploring overrun cities. Stack and assemble an arsenal of weapons and blast apart each horrific creature that comes your way through the five comic chapters of the game. Outer Terror has 10 playable characters with their own weapons and skills to explore the massive maps alone or with friends. Outer Terror is available on April 20 with a free demo available now.

#GameTrailers #Gaming
